newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Rate cut good for small business - Canberra.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Rate cut good for small business - Canberra.

text.p: Australian Small Business Minister Geoff Prosser said the interest rate cut announced by the Reserve Bank earlier on Wednesday would boost small business consumer confidence.

"The cut will provide an important boost to small business consumer confidence and further increase the spending power of the customers of small business as well as making the businesses more competitive," Prosser said in a statement.
Prosser said it would provide impetus for small business to hire more staff and invest in capital and new technology.
The Reserve Bank said it would reduce interest rates to 6.0 percent from 6.5 percent.
The timing of the movement took markets by surprise after rates were cut on November 6 and July 31 by the same amount.
